title: Vivifi India Finance bags $75 million in Series B funding
description: Hyderabad-based Fintech NBFC, Vivifi India Finance, has successfully secured $75 million in a Series B funding round, combining debt and equity. The capital infusion, backed by a leading player in Speciality/Alternative Finance in the USA, is expected to fuel Vivifi's mission of revolutionizing financial inclusion through technology-driven credit solutions.
